Creating Loadcase
---------------------

with Python code
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

The following code imports the `Loadcase` class and creates a root (top-level) node:

.. code-block:: python

    from pflacs import Loadcase
    rootnode = Loadcase("root-node")
    print(f"The name of the root node is «{rootnode.name}»")
